0.5.7.name: wordpress/smart-manager-for-wp-e-commerce
0.5.7.description:
Smart Manager is a unique, revolutionary tool that gives you the power to efficiently manage products, product variations, customers and orders using the popular WordPress e-Commerce plugins WooCommerce from WooThemes and WPeC from GetShopped / Instinct.

As a business owner, your time is better spent on marketing and customer service than on store administration. Unfortunately store administration with WooCommerce / WPeC can take significant time. Day after day.

Smart Manager will boost your productivity 10x in managing products, customers and orders. You can browse, search, and manage multiple products, customers or orders using a familiar, single page, spreadsheet like interface.

You will discover a new way of store administration with this add-on.

Smart Manager frees you up from mundane housekeeping tasks. So you can spend that time on anything that makes you more money. Use

3.1.2.name: wordpress/smart-manager-for-wp-e-commerce
3.1.2.description:
Smart Manager is a unique, revolutionary tool that gives you the power to efficiently manage products, product variations, customers and orders using the popular WordPress e-Commerce plugins WooCommerce from WooThemes and WPeC from GetShopped / Instinct.

As a business owner, your time is better spent on marketing and customer service than on store administration. Unfortunately store administration with WooCommerce / WPeC can take significant time. Day after day.

Smart Manager will boost your productivity 10x in managing products, customers and orders. You can browse, search, and manage multiple products, customers or orders using a familiar, single page, spreadsheet like interface.

You will discover a new way of store administration with this add-on.

Smart Manager frees you up from mundane housekeeping tasks. So you can spend that time on anything that makes you more money. Use
